mapper.select: SELECT p.PRODUCT_SEQ, p.CATEGORY_SEQ, c.CATEGORY_NAME, p.SECTOR_SEQ, p.GRADE_SEQ, p.USER_SEQ, p.PRODUCT_NAME, p.PRODUCT_PRICE, p.PRODUCT_STATUS, p.REGISTER_DATE, p.UPDATE_DATE, p.PRODUCT_AMOUNT, p.PRODUCT_WEIGHT FROM PRODUCT p JOIN CATEGORY c ON p.CATEGORY_SEQ = c.CATEGORY_SEQ WHERE p.USER_SEQ = #{ userSeq } ORDER BY p.REGISTER_DATE
